mapper.select:
SELECT xt_modify_record_id, xt_modify_record_ctime, xt_modify_record_beforevalue, xt_modify_record_aftervalue, xt_modify_record_modules, xt_modify_record_field, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id, business_id, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_modify_record xt_modify_record LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_modify_record.xt_userinfo_id=xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_modify_record_modules LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{xt_modify_record_modules}),'%')
AND xt_modify_record_field LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{xt_modify_record_field}),'%')
ORDER BY xt_modify_record_ctime DESC

SELECT xt_modify_record_id, xt_modify_record_ctime, xt_modify_record_beforevalue, xt_modify_record_aftervalue, xt_modify_record_modules, xt_modify_record_field, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id, business_id, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_modify_record xt_modify_record LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_modify_record.xt_userinfo_id=xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_modify_record_id=#{xt_modify_record_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_modify_record ( xt_modify_record_id, xt_modify_record_ctime, xt_modify_record_beforevalue, xt_modify_record_aftervalue, xt_modify_record_modules, xt_modify_record_field, xt_userinfo_id, business_id ) VALUES ( #{xt_modify_record_id}, #{xt_modify_record_ctime}, #{xt_modify_record_beforevalue}, #{xt_modify_record_aftervalue}, #{xt_modify_record_modules}, #{xt_modify_record_field}, #{xt_userinfo_id}, #{business_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_modify_record SET xt_modify_record_id = #{xt_modify_record_id}, xt_modify_record_beforevalue = #{xt_modify_record_beforevalue}, xt_modify_record_aftervalue = #{xt_modify_record_aftervalue}, xt_modify_record_modules = #{xt_modify_record_modules}, xt_modify_record_field = #{xt_modify_record_field}, xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id}, business_id = #{business_id} WHERE xt_modify_record_id=#{xt_modify_record_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_modify_record WHERE xt_modify_record_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO xt_modify_record ( xt_modify_record_id, xt_modify_record_ctime, xt_modify_record_beforevalue, xt_modify_record_aftervalue, xt_modify_record_modules, xt_modify_record_field, xt_userinfo_id, business_id ) VALUES
( #{item.xt_modify_record_id}, #{item.xt_modify_record_ctime}, #{item.xt_modify_record_beforevalue}, #{item.xt_modify_record_aftervalue}, #{item.xt_modify_record_modules}, #{item.xt_modify_record_field}, #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, #{item.business_id} )

update.foreach: UPDATE xt_modify_record SET xt_modify_record_id = #{item.xt_modify_record_id}, xt_modify_record_beforevalue = #{item.xt_modify_record_beforevalue}, xt_modify_record_aftervalue = #{item.xt_modify_record_aftervalue}, xt_modify_record_modules = #{item.xt_modify_record_modules}, xt_modify_record_field = #{item.xt_modify_record_field}, xt_userinfo_id = #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, business_id = #{item.business_id} WHERE xt_modify_record_id=#{item.xt_modify_record_id}
